Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
SingleGame
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
this is the game class, every check and player action use a game method

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Game​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> nicknames)
    this is the constructor of the class, it initialize the three boolean of vatican report at false; set the nickname of players; initialize randomly MarbleMarket and CardsMarket, create all leaderCards and assign four of them to each player

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void activateBasicProduction​(CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse, CollectionResources toPayFromStrongbox, Resource output)
    this method activate the basic production, paying the resources from the warehouse and from the strongbox, getting as output the resource output it requires that the method checkActivateBasicProduction with the same inputs return true
    boolean activateLeaderCard​(int toActivate)
    this method activate the card leader specified by the parameter (it can be the first one or the second one) of the actual player, the method verify if the player have all the requirements to activate the card, and in case activating it if the card selected is already active does not activate it and return false
    void activateLeaderProduction​(int toActivate, Resource output, boolean fromWarehouse)
    this method activate a leader production, it requires that the inputs are correct in particular, it adds a faith point to the actual player, it pay the resource associated with the leader production toActivate from warehouse or from strongbox, depending on the flag fromWarehouse, and it get as output the resource given as parameter
    void activateProduction​(int position, CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse)
    this method activate the normal production of the actual player in particular, it pay the resources to pay from warehouse from the warehouse, it calculate the resources to get from strongbox as card.getInput - toPayFromWarehouse and remove them from strongbox, finally it get the output resources and place them in the buffer last, but not least, it adds to the actual player the faith points associated with the output production of the card
    void addFaithPointsExceptTo​(RealPlayer actualPlayer, int toAdd)
    this method is used to add faithPoints to all players except one, this one is the actualPlayer
    protected void addFaithPointsTo​(RealPlayer actualPlayer, int toAdd)
    this method is used to add faithPoints at only one player
    void buyCard​(int level, CardColor color, int position, CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse)
    this method buy a card paying its cost and locate it in the dashboard, in particular, it get and remove the card selected by the level and the color from the market, it place the card in the dashboard at the position selected, it infer the resources to pay from the strongbox as the resources to pay from warehouse given in input minus the cost (eventually discounted) of the card, and pay the resources from the warehouse and the dashboard NB: it requires that the inputs are all correct
    boolean changeWhiteMarble​(java.util.List<Marble> marbles, int leaderWhiteMarble)
    this method substitute one of the white marbles of the array given in input with the marble selected from the parameter leaderWhiteMarble in the actual player
    boolean checkActivateBasicProduction​(CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse, CollectionResources toPayFromStrongbox, Resource output)
    this method verify if the actual player can activate a basic production.
    boolean checkActivateLeaderProduction​(int toCheck, boolean fromWarehouse)
    this method verify if the resource associated with the leader production given in input is contained in the warehouse of the actual player when fromWarehouse == true, if it is contained in the strongbox of the actual player when fromWarehouse == false
    boolean checkActivateProduction​(int position, CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse)
    this method verify if the actual player can activate the card specified by the position in input taking from the warehouse the resources given in input in particular, it verify 3 things 1) the resources to pay from warehouse are actually all contained into it 2) the resources to pay from strongbox are actually all contained into it 3) the sum of the resources to get from warehouse and the resources to get from strongbox are equals to the input resources of the card NB: the resources to pay from strongbox can be calculated as the input resources of the card minus the resources to get from the warehouse
    boolean checkBuyCard​(int level, CardColor color)
    this method check if a deck of card is empty, or if the inputs are correct, and if the actual player contains all the resources to buy the card, and if the card selected can be placed in the player dashboard
    void checkEndGame()
    this method check if the conditions for the end of the game are met, in particular, it get the number of cards in dashboard for every player, take the max value, and check if the last vatican report is true or if a player bought more than 6 cards
    boolean checkInitialising​(java.lang.String nickname, CollectionResources resources)
    this method verify if the nickname is associated with one player and if the resources are correct based on the position of the inkwell
    boolean checkLeaderCard​(int toCheck)
    this method verify if the actual player own the leader card selected by the parameter in input
    boolean checkPlacement​(DevelopmentCard toCheck, int position)
    this method verify if a placement of a card of the actual player is legit or not
    boolean checkProduction​(int position)
    this method verify if a player can activate the production associated with the position.
    boolean checkShelfSelected​(int numOfShelf)
    this method verify if the shelf selected is actually correct, is not correct if the input is not between 1 and the number of shelves that a player own (worst case = 5)
    boolean checkWarehouseResources​(DevelopmentCard card, CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse)
    this method verify if the actual player can buy the card in input taking from the warehouse the resources given in input in particular, it verify 3 things 1) the resources to pay from warehouse are actually all contained into it 2) the resources to pay from strongbox are actually all contained into it 3) the sum of the resources to get from warehouse and the resources to get from strongbox are equals to the cost of the card the method works correctly even if the actual player contain a discount of resources, inferring the cost of the card discounted NB: the resources to pay from strongbox can be calculated as the cost (eventually discounted) of the card minus the resources to get from the warehouse
    boolean contains​(CollectionResources toVerify)
    this method verify if the resources of the player of the current turn contain all the resources given in input
    boolean containsInStrongbox​(CollectionResources toVerify)
    this method verify if the strongbox resources of the player of the current turn contain all the resources given in input
    boolean containsInWarehouse​(CollectionResources toVerify)
    this method verify if the warehouse resources of the player of the current turn contain all the resources given in input
    boolean containsWithDiscount​(CollectionResources toVerify)
    this method verify if the discounted resources of the player of the current turn contain all the resources given in input
    CollectionResources convert​(java.util.List<Marble> marbles)
    this method convert an array of marbles to his equivalent collectionResources giving to the actual player a faith point if the array contains a red marble
    boolean discardLeaderCard​(int toDiscard)
    this method discard the leader card specified by the parameter (it can be the first one or the second one) of the actual player, if the card has already been activated, it does not discard it, if not, the method return true and add a faith point to the player
    void endProduction()
    this method terminate a production, it is called once that the player decides to end it, and it fill the strongbox with the resources stored in the buffer during the productions
    void endTurn()
    this method end the turn.
    RealPlayer findPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
    this method get the player from his nickname it return null if the game does not contain any player with that nickname
    RealPlayer getActualPlayer()
    this method get the player of the current turn
    Player getLorenzoIlMagnifico()
    this method get a player representing lorenzo il magnifico.
    MarbleMarket getMarketBoard()
    this method get the market board of the game
    java.util.List<RealPlayer> getPlayers()
    this method get a list of the players that are playing the game
    CardsMarket getSetOfCard()
    this method get the set of cards of the game
    java.util.List<SoloToken> getSoloTokens()
    this method get the list of solo tokens of the game.
    int getTurnManager()
    this method get the turn manager of the game, that indicates the turn
    boolean[] getVaticanReports()
    this method get an array of 3 boolean representing the 3 game vatican reports
    java.lang.String getWinner()
    this method return the nickname of the winner.
    protected void handleVaticanReport()
    this method is use to handle every vaticanReport; this method is called every time to check if we must activate a popeFavorTile card in track
    void initialiseGame​(java.lang.String nickname, CollectionResources toAdd, int leaderCardToReject1, int leaderCardToReject2)
    this method is called for each player, and it gives him some resources and some faith point depending on the position of the inkwell and discard 2 leader cards the resources get added automatically in the free shelves then the player could shift them
    void insertInWarehouse​(int shelf, Resource typeRequired, CollectionResources marblesConverted)
    this method insert in warehouse all the resources of the collection marbleConverted that are equals to the resource typeRequired in the shelf selected
    boolean isYourTurn​(java.lang.String nickname)
    this method verify if the player that have the nickname in input is the player that have to play the turn
    java.util.List<Marble> selectColumn​(int column)
    this method get the column selected from the market board and shift up all the marbles of that column of one position
    java.util.List<Marble> selectRow​(int row)
    this method get the row selected from the market board and shift left all the marbles of that row of one position
    protected void setVaticanReports​(int index)
    this method is used to set vaticanReports vector
    boolean shiftResources​(int source, int destination)
    this method shift two shelves if they are both normal, it move a single resource from the source shelf to the destination one if one of them is a leader shelf in the first case, if some resources are discarded, the method adds the faith points to every player except to the actual one and handle a vatican report in the second case, it can return false if the action is not possible

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public Player getLorenzoIlMagnifico()
      this method get a player representing lorenzo il magnifico. in particular, if the game is a single game, it returns the right player, it returns null otherwise
      Returns:
      a player representing lorenzo il magnifico

      public java.util.List<SoloToken> getSoloTokens()

      Returns:

      Parameters:

    • checkInitialising

      public boolean checkInitialising​(java.lang.String nickname, CollectionResources resources)
      this method verify if the nickname is associated with one player and if the resources are correct based on the position of the inkwell
      Parameters:
      nickname - this is the nickname of the player to check
      resources - these are the resources to check
      Returns:
      true if the parameters are correct, false otherwise

    • findPlayer

      public RealPlayer findPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
      this method get the player from his nickname it return null if the game does not contain any player with that nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - this is the nickname to check
      Returns:
      the player if the game contains it, null otherwise

    • isYourTurn

      public boolean isYourTurn​(java.lang.String nickname)
      this method verify if the player that have the nickname in input is the player that have to play the turn
      Parameters:
      nickname - this is the nickname of the player to check
      Returns:
      true if is the turn of this player, false otherwise

    • initialiseGame

      public void initialiseGame​(java.lang.String nickname, CollectionResources toAdd, int leaderCardToReject1, int leaderCardToReject2)
      this method is called for each player, and it gives him some resources and some faith point depending on the position of the inkwell and discard 2 leader cards the resources get added automatically in the free shelves then the player could shift them
      Parameters:
      nickname - this is the nickname of the player, it requires that is associated with one and only one player
      toAdd - these are the resources to add in the player warehouse, it requires is not null
      leaderCardToReject1 - this is the index of the first leader card to reject, it requires is between 1 and 4
      leaderCardToReject2 - this is the index of the second leader card to reject, it requires is between 1 and 4

    • checkShelfSelected

      public boolean checkShelfSelected​(int numOfShelf)
      this method verify if the shelf selected is actually correct, is not correct if the input is not between 1 and the number of shelves that a player own (worst case = 5)
      Parameters:
      numOfShelf - this is the index of the shelf to check
      Returns:
      true if the number of the shelves is more than input false otherwise

    • shiftResources

      public boolean shiftResources​(int source, int destination) throws EndGameException
      this method shift two shelves if they are both normal, it move a single resource from the source shelf to the destination one if one of them is a leader shelf in the first case, if some resources are discarded, the method adds the faith points to every player except to the actual one and handle a vatican report in the second case, it can return false if the action is not possible
      Parameters:
      source - this is the index of the source shelf
      destination - this is the index of the destination shelf
      Returns:
      false if one of the two shelves is a leader one and is not possible to move a resource, false otherwise
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, or a player buy more than 6 development cards, or when a column of the cardsMarket is empty, only in a single game

    • changeWhiteMarble

      public boolean changeWhiteMarble​(java.util.List<Marble> marbles, int leaderWhiteMarble)
      this method substitute one of the white marbles of the array given in input with the marble selected from the parameter leaderWhiteMarble in the actual player
      Parameters:
      marbles - this is the list of white marbles
      leaderWhiteMarble - this is the index associated with the marble to substitute
      Returns:
      false if the leaderWhiteMarbles do not contain any white marble, or if the marbles are null, or if the parameter leaderWhiteMarble is not between 1 and 2 or if the leaderWhiteMarble selected doesn't exist true otherwise

    • convert

      public CollectionResources convert​(java.util.List<Marble> marbles) throws EndGameException
      this method convert an array of marbles to his equivalent collectionResources giving to the actual player a faith point if the array contains a red marble
      Parameters:
      marbles - these are the marbles to convert
      Returns:
      the collectionResources associated with the marbles
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, or a player buy more than 6 development cards, or when a column of the cardsMarket is empty, only in a single game

    • selectRow

      public java.util.List<Marble> selectRow​(int row)
      this method get the row selected from the market board and shift left all the marbles of that row of one position
      Parameters:
      row - this is the row to shift
      Returns:
      the arraylist of marbles given

    • selectColumn

      public java.util.List<Marble> selectColumn​(int column)
      this method get the column selected from the market board and shift up all the marbles of that column of one position
      Parameters:
      column - this is the column to shift
      Returns:
      the arraylist of marbles given

    • insertInWarehouse

      public void insertInWarehouse​(int shelf, Resource typeRequired, CollectionResources marblesConverted) throws EndGameException
      this method insert in warehouse all the resources of the collection marbleConverted that are equals to the resource typeRequired in the shelf selected
      Parameters:
      shelf - this is the shelf in which add the resources
      typeRequired - this is the resource that must be taken and insert from marblesConverted to the warehouse
      marblesConverted - these are the resources that have to be filtered they are associated with the marbles already got from the market
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, or a player buy more than 6 development cards, or when a column of the cardsMarket is empty, only in a single game

    • checkBuyCard

      public boolean checkBuyCard​(int level, CardColor color)
      this method check if a deck of card is empty, or if the inputs are correct, and if the actual player contains all the resources to buy the card, and if the card selected can be placed in the player dashboard
      Parameters:
      level - this is the level of the card to check, it should be between 1 and 3
      color - this is the color of the card to check, it shouldn't be null
      Returns:
      true if there is a card in the deck with the level and color specified in the parameters in the market and the player has enough resources to buy the card and the card can be placed in the dashboard, false if the deck selected is empty or if the inputs aren't correct or if the player can't afford the card selected or if the card can't be placed in the dashboard

    • checkPlacement

      public boolean checkPlacement​(DevelopmentCard toCheck, int position)
      this method verify if a placement of a card of the actual player is legit or not
      Parameters:
      toCheck - this is the card to check, it requires that is not null
      position - this is the position of the array of card in which the method have to check, it should go from 1 to 3
      Returns:
      true if the level of the card in input is a level up compared to the card in the position in input or the card in input has a level one and the deck of cards specified in input is empty, false if not, or if the position is not between 1 and 3

    • checkWarehouseResources

      public boolean checkWarehouseResources​(DevelopmentCard card, CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse)
      this method verify if the actual player can buy the card in input taking from the warehouse the resources given in input in particular, it verify 3 things 1) the resources to pay from warehouse are actually all contained into it 2) the resources to pay from strongbox are actually all contained into it 3) the sum of the resources to get from warehouse and the resources to get from strongbox are equals to the cost of the card the method works correctly even if the actual player contain a discount of resources, inferring the cost of the card discounted NB: the resources to pay from strongbox can be calculated as the cost (eventually discounted) of the card minus the resources to get from the warehouse
      Parameters:
      card - this is the card to check if the player can buy
      toPayFromWarehouse - these are the resources that the player want to pay from the warehouse
      Returns:
      true if the player can buy the card, false otherwise

    • buyCard

      public void buyCard​(int level, CardColor color, int position, CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse) throws EndGameException
      this method buy a card paying its cost and locate it in the dashboard, in particular, it get and remove the card selected by the level and the color from the market, it place the card in the dashboard at the position selected, it infer the resources to pay from the strongbox as the resources to pay from warehouse given in input minus the cost (eventually discounted) of the card, and pay the resources from the warehouse and the dashboard NB: it requires that the inputs are all correct
      Parameters:
      level - this is the level of the card to buy
      color - this is the color of the card to buy
      position - this is the position in which place the card in the dashboard
      toPayFromWarehouse - these are the resources to pay from warehouse
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, or a player buy more than 6 development cards, or when a column of the cardsMarket is empty, only in a single game

    • checkProduction

      public boolean checkProduction​(int position)
      this method verify if a player can activate the production associated with the position. In particular, if the production has already been activated in the turn return false, if the position is between 1 and 3, that means a normal production, the method check if the actual player has a cart in that position, and if he owns the input resources, if the position is between 4 and 5, verify if the player own a leader production into his dashboard, and if the resource associated with it is owned by the player. the controller have to sum position 3 if it comes from a leader production if the position is not between 1 and 5 return false
      Parameters:
      position - this is the position on the dashboard of the production that the actual player want to activate
      Returns:
      true if the conditions to activate a production are respected, false otherwise

    • checkActivateProduction

      public boolean checkActivateProduction​(int position, CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse)
      this method verify if the actual player can activate the card specified by the position in input taking from the warehouse the resources given in input in particular, it verify 3 things 1) the resources to pay from warehouse are actually all contained into it 2) the resources to pay from strongbox are actually all contained into it 3) the sum of the resources to get from warehouse and the resources to get from strongbox are equals to the input resources of the card NB: the resources to pay from strongbox can be calculated as the input resources of the card minus the resources to get from the warehouse
      Parameters:
      position - this is the position of the card to activate, it requires that the card in the position exist
      toPayFromWarehouse - these are the resources to pay from the warehouse
      Returns:
      true if the card can be activated, false otherwise

    • activateProduction

      public void activateProduction​(int position, CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse) throws EndGameException
      this method activate the normal production of the actual player in particular, it pay the resources to pay from warehouse from the warehouse, it calculate the resources to get from strongbox as card.getInput - toPayFromWarehouse and remove them from strongbox, finally it get the output resources and place them in the buffer last, but not least, it adds to the actual player the faith points associated with the output production of the card
      Parameters:
      position - this is the position of the card to activate it requires that the card exist
      toPayFromWarehouse - these are the resources to pay from warehouse them require that the method checkActivateProduction(position, toPayFromWarehouse ) == true
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, or a player buy more than 6 development cards, or when a column of the cardsMarket is empty, only in a single game

    • checkActivateBasicProduction

      public boolean checkActivateBasicProduction​(CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse, CollectionResources toPayFromStrongbox, Resource output)
      this method verify if the actual player can activate a basic production. in particular, if: 1) the resources to pay from warehouse are actually all contained into it 2) the resources to pay from strongbox are actually all contained into it 3) the size of the resources to pay fro warehouse plus the resources to pay from strongbox is not 2
      Parameters:
      toPayFromWarehouse - these are the resources to pay from warehouse
      toPayFromStrongbox - these are the resources to pay from strongbox
      output - this is the resource to get in output
      Returns:
      true if the production can be activated, false otherwise

    • activateBasicProduction

      public void activateBasicProduction​(CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse, CollectionResources toPayFromStrongbox, Resource output)
      this method activate the basic production, paying the resources from the warehouse and from the strongbox, getting as output the resource output it requires that the method checkActivateBasicProduction with the same inputs return true
      Parameters:
      toPayFromWarehouse - these are the resources to pay from warehouse them require that are contained in the warehouse
      toPayFromStrongbox - these are the resources to pay from strongbox them require that are contained in the strongbox
      output - this is the resource to get as output

    • checkActivateLeaderProduction

      public boolean checkActivateLeaderProduction​(int toCheck, boolean fromWarehouse)
      this method verify if the resource associated with the leader production given in input is contained in the warehouse of the actual player when fromWarehouse == true, if it is contained in the strongbox of the actual player when fromWarehouse == false
      Parameters:
      toCheck - this is the index of the resource to check it requires that the resource exist
      fromWarehouse - this is the flag that verify if the check should be done in the warehouse or in the strongbox
      Returns:
      true if the player contains the resource selected correctly, false otherwise

    • activateLeaderProduction

      public void activateLeaderProduction​(int toActivate, Resource output, boolean fromWarehouse) throws EndGameException
      this method activate a leader production, it requires that the inputs are correct in particular, it adds a faith point to the actual player, it pay the resource associated with the leader production toActivate from warehouse or from strongbox, depending on the flag fromWarehouse, and it get as output the resource given as parameter
      Parameters:
      toActivate - this is the index of the leader production to activate
      output - this is the resource to get as output of the production
      fromWarehouse - this is the flag that verify if the payment of the resource should be done in the warehouse or in the strongbox
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, or a player buy more than 6 development cards, or when a column of the cardsMarket is empty, only in a single game

    • endProduction

      public void endProduction()
      this method terminate a production, it is called once that the player decides to end it, and it fill the strongbox with the resources stored in the buffer during the productions

    • checkLeaderCard

      public boolean checkLeaderCard​(int toCheck)
      this method verify if the actual player own the leader card selected by the parameter in input
      Parameters:
      toCheck - this is the index of the leader card to check
      Returns:
      true if the player own a leader card in that position, false otherwise

    • activateLeaderCard

      public boolean activateLeaderCard​(int toActivate)
      this method activate the card leader specified by the parameter (it can be the first one or the second one) of the actual player, the method verify if the player have all the requirements to activate the card, and in case activating it if the card selected is already active does not activate it and return false
      Parameters:
      toActivate - this is the index of the owned leader card to activate
      Returns:
      true if the card got activated correctly, false otherwise

    • discardLeaderCard

      public boolean discardLeaderCard​(int toDiscard) throws EndGameException
      this method discard the leader card specified by the parameter (it can be the first one or the second one) of the actual player, if the card has already been activated, it does not discard it, if not, the method return true and add a faith point to the player
      Parameters:
      toDiscard - this is the index of the owned leader card to discard it should be from 1 to personalLeaderCards.getSize()
      Returns:
      true if the card got discarded correctly, false otherwise
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, only in a single game

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn() throws EndGameException
      this method end the turn. in particular, increment the turnManager
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, or a player buy more than 6 development cards,

    • checkEndGame

      public void checkEndGame() throws EndGameException
      this method check if the conditions for the end of the game are met, in particular, it get the number of cards in dashboard for every player, take the max value, and check if the last vatican report is true or if a player bought more than 6 cards
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, or a player buy more than 6 development cards,

    • handleVaticanReport

      protected void handleVaticanReport() throws EndGameException
      this method is use to handle every vaticanReport; this method is called every time to check if we must activate a popeFavorTile card in track
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, only in a single game

    • addFaithPointsTo

      protected void addFaithPointsTo​(RealPlayer actualPlayer, int toAdd) throws EndGameException
      this method is used to add faithPoints at only one player
      Parameters:
      actualPlayer - is the player who can advance on the faith track
      toAdd - is the number of faithTrack position to add to the actual player
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, only in a single game

    • addFaithPointsExceptTo

      public void addFaithPointsExceptTo​(RealPlayer actualPlayer, int toAdd) throws EndGameException
      this method is used to add faithPoints to all players except one, this one is the actualPlayer
      Parameters:
      actualPlayer - is the player who remains in the same position;
      toAdd - is the number of faithTrack position to add to all players except one, the actualPlayer
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, only in a single game

    • getActualPlayer

      public RealPlayer getActualPlayer()
      this method get the player of the current turn
      Returns:
      the player of the current turn

    • getWinner

      public java.lang.String getWinner()
      this method return the nickname of the winner. in particular, it get the nickname of the player with more victory points, if there are some players with the same number of victory points, the method return the player with more victory points and more resources, if there are some players with the same victory points and amount of resources, return a random player from them. if there is a single game, it gets the single player nickname when his number of cards is >= 7 or if his position reached the last vatican report
      Returns:
      the nickname of the winner

    • contains

      public boolean contains​(CollectionResources toVerify)
      this method verify if the resources of the player of the current turn contain all the resources given in input
      Parameters:
      toVerify - these are the resources to check
      Returns:
      true if the resources of the player of the current turn contains all the resources given in input

    • containsWithDiscount

      Parameters:
      toVerify - these are the resources to check
      Returns:
      true if the discounted resources of the player of the current turn contains all the resources given in input
